content.rendered:
Time period to “waive” Student Health Insurance for the Spring Semester is Nov. 20 – Feb. 3.
To “waive” out, go to ULV Insurance Dashboard or call (833) 866-8931

 

The Student Health Center is conveniently located on the main La Verne campus and is staffed by a university-employed licensed clinical professional (doctors, physician assistants, or nurse practitioners) who provide services for acute and chronic medical concerns. To assist the clinicians, ULV employees registered nurses, licensed vocational nurses, certified medical assistants, and supportive office staff personnel.

There is no out of pocket charges for services rendered through Student Health Services to ULV enrolled students for on the services.
